actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-156.

official_title: A resolution to provide additional funds for the Committee on Appropriations.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committee on Appropriations to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $75,000, in addition to the amount, and for the same investigatory and study purposes, specified in the Legislative Reorganization Act.

titles.title: A resolution to provide additional funds for the Committee on Appropriations.
